text: The Cumberland River is a major waterway of the Southern United States. The -longU.S. Geological Survey. National Hydrography Dataset high-resolution flowline data. The National Map , accessed June 8, 2011 river goes through of southern Kentucky and north-central Tennessee. The river flows generally west from a source in the Appalachian Mountains. It merges with the Ohio River near Paducah, Kentucky, and the mouth of the Tennessee River. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Rivers of Kentucky Category:Rivers of Tennessee
title: Cumberland River
